Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Good morning.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You heard a strange sound? Oh,
sorry about that!
<PAGE>
I guess I woke you up. It's another one 
of my jobs. Forgive me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I say job... it's more like a
hobby.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I deliver the <RED>letters</RED> for the town. I
put it in that <RED>mailbox</RED> there.
<PAGE>
I put the <RED>newspaper</RED> in for this week,
so take a look later.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll take this chance to explain about
the mailbox.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you press the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> in front of
the mailbox you can check for <RED>newspapers</RED>
and <RED>letters</RED> that have been sent to you.
Listen to explanation
Don't listen to explanation

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, fine. I'll put the explanation in
the bookshelf in your house, so take a
look there if you have questions.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's head out into town, shall we?

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Good morning, Dunhill.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <BLUE>Emma</BLUE>, <BLUE>Hana</BLUE>. As I said yesterday,
I've brought <MYNAME> here to see you.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Oh, this is <MYNAME>? I'm so happy that
someone so young has come to live in our
town!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this is <BLUE>Hana</BLUE>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Nice to meet you, <MYNAME>. My name is
Hana. I run the <GREEN>General Store</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
That's the shop over there. The one with
the red bricks at the entrance.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I sell seeds that you can grow on your
farm and tools you'll need in your
everyday life. Take a look sometime!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, this is <BLUE>Emma</BLUE>.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I am Emma. I work in
shipping.
<PAGE>
I'll be the one responsible for shipping
out the things you grow on your farm.
They'll be safe with me!
<PAGE>
My house is over there. The one with the
purple roof and the fence.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you send an item, I'll give you the
money for it the following morning.
I'll give you all the details later.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, sorry. There's something I have to
do today. I need to get home...

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm busy too. I'd better get going.
<PAGE>
Dunhill, <MYNAME>, see you later.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right then, <MYNAME>. Let's continue the
tour.
<PAGE>
I'll take this chance to tell you about
the <RED>mini-map</RED> as well.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you head down this way you'll come
to the <GREEN>river</GREEN>. It's the place we met
yesterday, remember?
<PAGE>
You can pick herbs, flowers and fruit
there.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, come this way.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Up ahead are the <GREEN>Festival Grounds</GREEN>
where the town <RED>festival</RED> is held.
<PAGE>
We don't have many festivals any more,
however. I hope you'll take part if you
get a chance.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is an empty house. Someone did live
here in the past, but they moved on...
<PAGE>
There's no need to dwell on that,
anyway. I'm now sure someone will come
and live here again someday.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just ahead from here is the <GREEN>Forest</GREEN>.
You can get a lot more fruit there
than you can by the river.
<PAGE>
In between the forest and the river you
will find the <GREEN>Mountain</GREEN>. Take a stroll up
there sometime.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That house with the red roof is where
the <GREEN>Animal Dealer</GREEN> lives.
<PAGE>
Unfortunately he's currently out of
town, trying to get new stock. I'll
introduce you to him when he gets back.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think that covers everything in town.
I'll finish up by telling you how to
buy items from Hana's shop.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I almost forgot. I haven't explained
how to buy things yet. Let's go to the
General Store.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello again. What can I do for you?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wanted to show <MYNAME> how to buy
things from the General Store.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can handle that, if you like. Do you
mind, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee hee. Don't worry, I won't bite. Just
listen carefully.

<SPEED_IMME>
You got <GREEN>Farming Tools</GREEN> and <GREEN>seeds</GREEN>!

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The General Store is open on <BLUE>Monday,</BLUE>
<BLUE>Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday</BLUE>.
We're closed on <BLUE>Wednesday and Sunday</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
We're open from <BLUE>10:00 AM to 6:00 PM</BLUE>.
You can see all this info on the <GREEN>Sign</GREEN>
outside, too.
<PAGE>
When you want to buy something, talk to
me across the counter. That should be
everything.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go then. Thank you for your help,
Hana.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Not at all. Please come again, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Do you have anything else that
you need to do today?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then why not take a stroll around using
the mini-map for a while?
<PAGE>
You might like to try picking flowers or
fruit, or even catching some insects by
pressing the <BLUE>A Button</BLUE> when close to one.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once you're finished with your walk you
can go home and rest. It isn't good to
stay up late!
<PAGE>
Thank you for today. I'll see you 
tomorrow, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While guiding you around I'll also
explain about the <RED>mini-map</RED>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's get back to explaining things.

Time to take a walk! I could visit the
<GREEN>River</GREEN>, <GREEN>Forest</GREEN> or <GREEN>Mountain</GREEN>. Where to kick
things off...?
